name: Escape! (itch) (akvaxthelich)
description:
Escape! is a first person 3D platformer project made for an AR/VR class at my university. 

Controls
Movement: WASD
Jump: Space
Look: Mouse

Tip: Moving diagonally makes you faster!



This project may receive additional bug fixes, but will not be updated beyond that.

Thank you to all of my friends and playtesters!
